articles.title: India wins cricket Twenty20 World Cup in exciting final against South Africa
articles.description: India won its second T20 World Cup but its first world title in 12 years.
articles.content:
India pulled off a sensational seven-run win against South Africa in a gripping final of the Twenty20 World Cup on Saturday.
South Africa, playing its first ever final of an ICC tournament, needed a… [+1191 chars]

articles.author: Issy Ronald
articles.title: India wins men’s T20 World Cup, defeating South Africa in dramatic final
articles.description: India produced a brilliant performance to defeat South Africa in a dramatic men’s T20 World Cup final, ending a long 13-year wait for the cricket-obsessed nation since its last World Cup win.
articles.content:
India produced a brilliant performance to defeat South Africa in a dramatic mens T20 World Cup final, ending a long 13-year wait for the cricket-obsessed nation since its last World Cup win.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
